snippet: Sidney Crosby was limited to a supporting role, getting one assist, but the rest of the Penguins kept rolling in a victory over the Rangers at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New York Rangers, 5-2, in NHL action; Penguins center Sidney Crosby, appearing in his first game since Dec 2011, plays a supporting role in the win.
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby was limited to a supporting role, getting one assist, but the rest of the Penguins kept rolling in a victory over the Rangers at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Crosby Climbs Aboard a Rolling Team as Penguins Beat Rangers
headline.main: Crosby Climbs Aboard a Steamrolling Team
headline.print_headline: Crosby Climbs Aboard A Steamrolling Team
